items.title: All Steps | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: List of all steps for Structured Data Connector. Phoenix connector for converting data between popular Land Rover Discovery and forensic structured data formats - Concordance, CSV, IDX, JSON, XML and YAML.

items.title: FromConcordance Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Extracts entities from a Concordance stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: FromCSV Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Extracts entities from a CSV stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: FromIDX Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Create an entity from an IDX Stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: FromJson Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Extracts the entity from a Json stream containing a single entity.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: FromJsonArray Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Extracts entities from a Json stream containing an array of entities.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: FromXml Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Extracts the entity from a Xml stream containing a single entity.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: FromXmlArray Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Extracts entities from a Xml stream containing an array of entities.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: FromYaml Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Extracts the entity from a Yaml stream containing a single entity.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToConcordance Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Write entities to a stream in concordance format. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToCSV Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Write entities to a stream in CSV format. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToIDX Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Write an entity to a stream in IDX format.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToJson Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Writes an entity to a stream in JSON format. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToJsonArray Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Write entities to a stream in Json format.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToXml Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Writes an entity to a stream in XML format. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToXmlArray Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Write entities to a stream in Xml format.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

items.title: ToYaml Step | Structured Data Connector Documentation
items.description: Writes an entity to a stream in YAML format. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.
